title: Game shutdown during promotion ranked play, but team won only moments later. Marked as leave. Help?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: After playing a great game and about to close out my promotion, Windows decided that it wanted to install updates and everything restarted. Can anything be done? Its incredibly frustrating after finally getting to play, getting to promotions, only to be knocked down again when it was a clear and obvious win. Tried to reconnect but it was too late. Anyways to reset the status?

replies.body: to be fair, this must be the millionth time on the internet someones complained of a problem or something bad happening in a game because of a windows update. when you start your pc, just check for and update windows before you even start the league client up? this permanently solves all chances of this happening ever again. I've personally done this for years, and now its just like putting on a seatbelt in a car, i turn my pc on, and i check for and install if applicable, any windows updates. and i've never had a forced restart.

It looks like you were gone long enough to get marked as a leaver, which the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats equally because of the negative experiences it causes others.  Even if we wanted to, there's no way to adjust game stats or competitive advantages that could abuse the system.  It's definitely a frustrating circumstance to get an unexpected windows update, but I have hope you'll get through promos!  There's still lots of time left!

Legit thanks for checking in. Figured as much but wanted to check!

As and FYI, if you can disclose, what is the actual time margin?
